column4: lol BluesKaj I'm not a purist but I tend to prefer not to mix the two :)
i use quassel. adding on to what BluesKaj said, there are two versions of quassel in the repos. one uses kde libraries, while the other is pure qt
i find xchat's settings thing difficult to navigate, so back when i used gnome i used xchat-gnome.  BluesKaj and i just happen to be kde users though, so we use kde irc clients
